body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
$ spack install binutils
==> Warning: gcc@8.4.1 cannot build optimized binaries for "cascadelake". Using best target possible: "skylake_avx512"
[+] / (external diffutils-3.6-ug4ryzqf65k7ubjnlspxxyfspgqptvq7)
[+] / (external gettext-0.19.8.1-gyfx34m6ayzgy54ymnbayspjfyksg4aw)
[+] /g/data/jh2/bw0729/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-skylake_avx512/gcc-8.4.1/zlib-1.2.11-rqvwbys74elt7o6ozgcz42sbkeejkwb6
==> Installing binutils-2.36.1-pzrqxjmndqbz4o75oferejhzdyrsughk
==> No binary for binutils-2.36.1-pzrqxjmndqbz4o75oferejhzdyrsughk found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /g/data/jh2/bw0729/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/5b/5b4bd2e79e30ce8db0abd76dd2c2eae14a94ce212cfc59d3c37d23e24bc6d7a3.tar.bz2
==> No patches needed for binutils
==> binutils: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> binutils: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 77:
    '/scratch/jh2/bw0729/tmp/spack-stage/spack-stage-binutils-2.36.1-pzrqxjmndqbz4o75oferejhzdyrsughk/spack-src/configure' '--prefix=/g/data/jh2/bw0729/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-skylake_avx512/gcc-8.4.1/binutils-2.36.1-pzrqxjmndqbz4o75oferejhzdyrsughk' '--disable-dependency-tracking' '--disable-werror' '--enable-multilib' '--enable-64-bit-bfd' '--enable-targets=all' '--with-system-zlib' '--with-sysroot=/' '--enable-shared' '--enable-static' '--disable-lto' '--disable-ld' '--disable-gas' '--disable-interwork' '--disable-gold' '--enable-plugins' '--disable-install-libiberty' '--enable-nls'

2 errors found in build log:
     9     checking whether ln -s works... yes
     10    checking for a sed that does not truncate output... /bin/sed
     11    checking for gawk... gawk
     12    configure: WARNING: neither ld nor gold are enabled
     13    checking for gcc... /g/data/jh2/bw0729/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc
     14    checking whether the C compiler works... no
  >> 15    configure: error: in `/scratch/jh2/bw0729/tmp/spack-stage/spack-stage-binutils-2.36.1-pzrqxjmnd
           qbz4o75oferejhzdyrsughk/spack-src':
  >> 16    configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables
     17    See `config.log' for more details

See build log for details:
  /scratch/jh2/bw0729/tmp/spack-stage/spack-stage-binutils-2.36.1-pzrqxjmndqbz4o75oferejhzdyrsughk/spack-build-out.txt
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.2-3870-5916afec84
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos8-cascadelake
* **Concretizer:** original

### Additional information

[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6965871/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6965872/spack-build-out.txt)


### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: binutils
